text: Stade du 4-Août is a stadium in Ouagadougou, Burkina Faso. It is used mostly for football games and it also has an athletics track. The stadium can hold of 35,000 people. Etoile Filante Ouagadougou play their homes games at the stadium. ==References== ==Other websites== * Photo at worldstadiums.com * Photos at fussballtempel.net * Stadium at Openstreetmap Category:Football stadiums in Ouagadougou Category:1984 establishments
title: Stade du 4-Août
